about_the_game:
The Home Into The Woods

The Game

It's night in a forest, you are all alone or so you think. Something keeps moving in the trees walking through them like they're not real or is it not real? Collect 5 drawings to escape the woods before you succumb to your nightmares or worse...

A Piece From The Creator

I grew up in a children's care home and I suffered a great deal of pain and trauma. So I am making this game to try and help remove some of it and fuel my pain into something good. This game is to promote my full version of my game so none off this game is canon to the full game. Once I hit my GoFundMe goal I will work on the main game.

content_descriptors.notes: Jump scares are in the game. Plus a ending with blood and screams. A overall scary experience.
